snippet: WEISSELBERG--Edward B. The Society for the Protection of Nature in Israel (SPNI) and its American affiliate, NatureIsrael, mourns the passing of a devoted, wise friend and Board member, Edward Weisselberg. 'We extend our condolences to his wife Myrna and their children Debi, Michael and Dianne and their eight grandchildren.' Ed's extraordinary enthusiasm for life and dedication to improving the environment here and in Israel will be sorely missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEISSELBERG--Edward B. The Society for the Protection of Nature in Israel (SPNI) and its American affiliate, NatureIsrael, mourns the passing of a devoted, wise friend and Board member, Edward Weisselberg. 'We extend our condolences to his wife Myrna and their children Debi, Michael and Dianne and their eight grandchildren.' Ed's extraordinary enthusiasm for life and dedication to improving the environment here and in Israel will be sorely missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEISSELBERG, EDWARD B
